ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: just thought of something even more fun.  Accidently stay grouped with him at the start of the duel.  Then as your first song fire up Clouding.  Then disband
ygData.messageBody:
just thought of something even more fun. 'Accidently' stay grouped with him
at the start of the duel. Then as your first song fire up Clouding. Then
disband and beat him down, lol.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 12:19 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
>
>
> Few tips:
>
> 1) Do not group with him
> 2) Charm him and make him attack his pet (he can't cast
> spells at all, pet
> may even kill him before charm wears off)
> 3) Rinse and repeat
>
> Then for variety, run off with his pet in hot pursuit, chain
> pet then run
> back. Pet will get lost because it's so far away from him.
> Kill him when
> you get back, he can't make a new pet so he's even more
> helpless than a
> wizzie. When he dies pet goes poof.
>
> Lyrnia
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <beatdropbattledrum@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 3:02 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
>
>
> > I have dueled a mage once before. I lost, but I learned something.
> > 1) You can't charm the pet. 2) You can't charm people you are
> > grouped with.
> >
> > There was a bug where I tried charming the pet and it didn't work.
> > But once he killed me, his pet went berserk and attacked him... he
> > almost died. I say, get him back for your guild mates. Charm HIM
> > into attacking his pet. Let his pet kill him and he will lose exp
> > ;) He will love that!
> >
> > ~Beatdrop Battledrum
> > 43rd Bard of the Karana Server
> >
> > --- In eqbards@egroups.com, Bill Costlow <atlatyl@y...> wrote:
> > > A magician in my guild has been bragging for several
> > > days now about how great he is. He's dueled several
> > > players in my guild that are 2-3 lvls higher and
> > > defeated them (one was killed by his pet;-( )
> > >
> > > Anyway as I approach 30th lvl I expect to be
> > > challenged by this guy and, since his attitude really
> > > gets me going anyway, *really* don't want to lose...
> > >
> > > I have never dueled...I am more into the group and
> > > make friends aspect of this game.
> > >
> > > So far I figure pixie strike, song of siriens guardian
> > > and elemental rythmns will be my main songs....weapons
> > > are a T claw and gnoll hide lariet. (I also have a
> > > silvery axe but figure stunning is a good thing with a
> > > caster....)
> > >
> > > Any suggestions?
> > >
> > > __________________________________________________
> > > Do You Yahoo!?
> > > Send instant messages & get email alerts with Yahoo! Messenger.
> > > http://im.yahoo.com/
> >
> >
> >
